1.title: The Odds Are Already Against You
1.plot: Zeke wakes up to find out Meagan is more than eager to take their relationship to the next Level. Meanwhile Courtney, leaves town for another business trip in Las Vegas, leaving Greg feeling a certain way about it. Elsewhere, Todd and Cassandra move in to their new apartment, an experience that turns out to be quite frustrating for Cassandra. While, Liz deals with another performance gig been canceled and Ken hopeful at the possibility of a promotion at work.

2.title: Roses Are Red, Violets Are... WTF
2.plot: Zeke finally meets Meagan's family, which takes an unexpected turn. Ken arrives home to deliver the devastating news to Liz about loosing his job, their only source of income. While Greg is revealed to be more than meets the eye. Todd and Cassandra enjoys romantic bliss.

3.title: Love Is Not for the Faint of Heart
3.plot: Zeke finds himself in a very uncomfortable situation, trapped in a restroom with Meagan's sister. Ken arrives home and makes an awful discovery about Liz. While Cassandra receives an unwanted phone call. Courtney delivers unexpected news to Greg about another business trip out of town.

4.title: The Consequences of Love
4.plot: Zeke returns home tormented from his encounter with Megan's sister. Greg confides in Todd, about his current situation with Courtney and his reaction to it . After finding Liz overdosed from drugs, Ken gives her an ultimatum.

imdb.title: Love Struck
plot: Set in Los Angeles, where anti cupid is king. We are thrust in to the lives of an eclectic group of young lovers. As they navigate the adventures of their relationships with the odds all set against them. Will anti cupid win?::D L
